channel.title: git on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in git on Everyday Linux

item.title: Git Tips
item.description: Git Tips When you are required to use git over HTTPS but you don’t want to be prompted for your credentials every time. $ git config --global credential.helper cache $ git config credential.helper 'cache --timeout=3600' Set author display on git rebase $ git config --add rebase.instructionFormat "(%an <%ae>) %s" https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35851671/is-there-a-way-to-list-the-commits-author-in-git-rebase-i-interactive
